SiteName.Description: The name of the site to be deployed to.

Prefix.Description: The prefix for the Solr, SQL and Sitecore instances.

SitecoreAdminPassword.Description: The admin password for the Sitecore instance.

SqlAdminUser.Description: The Sql admin user account to use when installing databases.

SqlAdminPassword.Description: The Sql admin password to use when installing databases.

SQLServer.Description: The Sql Server where databases will be installed.

SolrRoot.Description: The file path to the Solr instance.

SolrService.Description: The name of the Solr service.

SXAPackage.Description: The path to the Sitecore Experience Accelerator package to deploy.

SPEPackage.Description: The path to the Sitecore Powershell Extensions package to deploy.

PackagesTempLocation.Description: Alternative location to save WDP packages. If left on the default $Env:Temp will be used.

DownloadLocations.Description: File with URI and SHA256 hashes of dynamically downloadable WDPs.

SXA:SiteName.Description: Override to pass SiteName value to SXA config.

SPE:SiteName.Description: Override to pass SiteName value to SPE config.

SXA:Package.Description: Override to pass SXAPackage value to SXA config.

SPE:Package.Description: Override to pass SPEPackage value to SPE config.

SPE:SQLServer.Description: Override to pass SQLServer value to SPE config.

SXA:SQLServer.Description: Override to pass SQLServer value to SXA config.

SXA:SqlAdminPassword.Description: Override to pass SqlAdminPassword value to SXA config.

SPE:SqlAdminPassword.Description: Override to pass SqlAdminPassword value to SPE config.

SXA:SqlAdminUser.Description: Override to pass SqlAdminUser value to SXA config.

SPE:SqlAdminUser.Description: Override to pass SqlAdminUser value to SPE config.

SXA:SqlDbPrefix.Description: Override to pass Prefix value to SXA config.

SPE:SqlDbPrefix.Description: Override to pass Prefix value to SPE config.

SXA:SolrCorePrefix.Description: Override to pass Prefix value to SXA config.

SXA:SitecoreAdminPassword.Description: Override to pass SitecoreAdminPassword value to SXA config.

Solr:CorePrefix.Description: Override to pass Prefix value to Solr config.

Solr:SolrUrl.Description: Override to pass SolrUrl to Solr config.

Solr:SolrService.Description: Override to pass SolrService to Solr config.

Solr:SolrRoot.Description: Override to pass SolrRoot to Solr config.

SPE:PackagesTempLocation.Description: Override to pass PackagesTempLocation value to SPE config.

SXA:PackagesTempLocation.Description: Override to pass PackagesTempLocation value to SXA config.

SPE:Downloads.Description: Override to pass Downloads value to SPE config.

SXA:Downloads.Description: Override to pass Downloads value to SXA config.
